text: @JoshNBCNews @PressSec #American lives don't matter to #PutinsPuppet and along with "slowing down testing" for #COVID19 he also does nothing to defend US troops from #Russian attacks.  It's all consistent with his blatant #TRE45ON and dereliction of presidential duty. https://t.co/IKm7PvwWIP
